name: Hisoka The Babysitter!
description:
In this backstory game, Hisoka must look after Candra. There are also some Mini Games that Hisoka can play along the way. Candra's brother and parents to go the movies. The Minsky family bought only 3 tickets, leaving out Candra. So they send her to the Hosokawa residence.

Hisoka's brother and parents go out for a picnic. The parents task Hisoka to babysit Candra until either the Minsky parents or the Hosokawa parents return.

However, the Hosokawa parents accidentally lock Hisoka out of the house.
